author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Another quick partially automatic BuildFile cleaning PR in the style of many before (for example https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30139), this time covering all `use`s in the plugins which are not directly in the root of the BuildFile. My script did not catch these before.

As always, only the dependencies which are **not included in any of the plugin sources** are removed, so these changes are orthogonal and complementary to the recent PRs which added all packages that are actually included in the **libraries**.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles. It was checked that all newly added dependencies are actually required by the package with `git grep`.
title: Clean BuildFiles in reco plugins
